name: filepay
description: Post data and upload files to bitcoin sv

scripts.test_scratch: mocha --timeout 30000 --grep '1 insufficient input and force specific input utxo provide unlocking script'
scripts.build: browserify index.js --standalone filepay > dist/filepay.js && uglifyjs dist/filepay.js > dist/filepay.min.js

author: MATTERCLOUD (Matter Web Services Inc.)
